resources.string:
Languages: Java, Scala
Web: JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap
Web Services: REST API, JSON, gRPC
Web/App Servers: Apache/Tomcat, Nginx
Frameworks: Spring Framework (Boot, Security, Data, AOP, DI, Cloud), Hibernate, Angular, React
Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MS SQL, NoSQL, Cassandra, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, CosmosDB
Message Queue: Kafka, ActiveMQ

Skilled software engineer with 8+ years of experience in software design and development using Agile/Scrum, Java, JavaScript, Spring, Hibernate, Angular, and React. Proven history of successful contributions to both start-ups and major companies, implementing complex distributed systems which use microservices and Cloud Native to ensure scalability and reliability.
